description: Allowed amount for all applicable coverages for the professional charge in the price estimate. This table has data for dental estimates using multiple coverages only. Refer to the ALLOWED_AMT column in PR_EST_PROFEE_PROC for all other cases.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: PROC_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The expected allowed amount specified for this procedure and corresponding coverage (I PES 168).
